name: 摸金校尉之九幽将军
description:
Mojin Returns is an adventure treasure hunt tour authorized by the authors of ghost blowing lamp series, Tiankeng series and MOJIN Xiaowei series. The game integrates many elements such as Tomb going, secret exploration and treasure hunting. The strange and strange organs, magical and mysterious zongzi and the story of being sealed in the underground world have been prepared. You will enter the fantasy world written by the author and write your golden years.
Experience the original work and experience the classic plot
The game tries its best to restore the strange world written by Tianxia ba. There are all kinds of classic plots and scenes with protagonists, dangers and heavy organs. Here, you walk with Hu Bayi, Wang pangzi and Shirley yang to find the secret in the ancient ruins, and a mysterious and shocking adventure feast is about to begin.
Seeing the stars through the clouds can help us understand the secrets of life
Time after time, the journey of finding gold reveals not the ancient tomb, but the dusty history and human nature. This time, what is waiting for you is treasure or trap. Under the heavy coffin, there is a dusty truth of history or a fatal mechanism. Exploring the huge underground world, every unknown corner is facing the test of life and death.
The eight sects have their own strengths and can change freely
As a protagonist, you can change your career and learn different specialties. Maybe these professional skills are your only hope of survival at the critical moment of life and death.
Classic reproduction, IP props arm your bag
Engineer shovel, geomantic omen, Chicago typewriter... These classic props in the novel will be reproduced here. Each departure is a contest of life and death. Weapons, food, medicine... Limited luggage space, how will you choose?
Touch the golden iron triangle, share life and death, and take risks
Light a candle in the southeast corner, and the figure of the iron triangle will gradually become clear. Hu Bayi, who is proficient in Feng Shui, Wang pangzi, who has accurate shooting skills, and Shirley Yang, who is calm and intelligent, are all with you. The journey to find gold in the tomb was officially opened.
